note: Gilded Dreams >> Deepwood. Only put Deepwoon on him if really no one else in the party can use it. If you play quicken, aim for 200-300 EM before you go into crit. MH is also valid in Nilou Teams without Kirara

Add EM when playing Vaporize. Whimsy > Gladiator, but if you have great pieces, the latter can be valid. Reverie only works in burn teams but there can be as good as whimsy (and can be farmed together)
Many Dendro DPSs rely on having one party member wear Deepwood while not wanting to equip it themselves. Baizhu can be that party member. This is not for Baizhus own damage, cause it is neglible.
A generalist set when Deepwood is not required/held by someone else. Baizhu maxes out Clamage
do not farm Maiden Beloved only for Barbara
Niche Build

Song of Days past is a valid alternative when someone else on the team is already using noblesse and is best used by a C6 Chevreuse. Burst is irrelevant to her buff, so the player can choose to not include it in their rotation.
Emblem is the best option for Chev's personal damage, however, Golden Troupe can also work for a C4+ when she uses all 3 skill charges
do not run triple DEF%, husk preferable at C6
Noblesse to buff with burst, emblem to maximize damage output. Reverie when playing burnmelt
This build assumes that Collei is your only dendro dps. For other dendro reactions, use deepwood.
Flower is technically the better set but by such a small margin that it does not justify farming it
HP become a relevant stat from C1 onwards, Vourokasha becomes equal or better at C4 or higher
Deepwood is a valid allrounder set but if someone in your team already has it, switch traveler to Gilded Dreams
Witch is better than gilded but with good substats gilded can also be good and is easier to farm. Assumes you play vape.

Many Dendro DPSs rely on having one party member wear Deepwood while not wanting to equip it themselves. Dori can be that party member. Thanks to her high burst duration, she gets excellent uptime on the dendro res shred.

When playing Dori for Hyperbloom she will sometimes also trigger Aggravate/Electro-Charged damage on the side. Gilded dreams buffs all of these maximizing her damage output. FoPL is an alternative but will only focus on the hyperbloom damage.
Battery = Energy Generator for others (in this case with skill), Emblem does this best while noblesse (worse) is for buffing with burst
prioritize ER over main stats
prioritize ER over main stats
MH when you play with Furina
Playing with Furina and using MH is the best option for Cryo Freminet. If for some reason you cant/wont pair him with her, use Blizzard Strayer.
Crimson Witch is on par with Marechausee

Gorou is a buffer and should not be optimized for his personal damage. Finding the right set is tricky cause noblesse is not as helpfulf to def sclaing chars, but the exile is only a 4star. Husk is the least recommended option, but you often have husk from farming for his other team members anyway AND it boosts the healing from C4.
Shimenawa boosts attacks and charged attacks but means less burst
recommended to have nilou in the party, but hyperbloom also possible. 2pc combination only slightly worse than 4pc.
Any character can be a support if you just equip them with Noblesse Oblige and let them burst. Even the Hydro Traveler.
Personal damage is not the hydro travelers stregth
VV is best due to resistance shred. If someone else is already using VV, pair it with gladiator to maximize Jean's damage output
Sunfire abuses the Pyro self-application from Bennett’s Burst, which is Swirled by the Anemo self-application from Jean’s Burst.

artifact_set_1: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City

note: Generalist set for Kaveh, usually used in Nilou Bloom teams. He is also a viable driver for burgeon oder hyperbloom even if he does not buff those reactions.

Putting Ocean-Hued Clam on someone who isn't a healer may seem counterintuitive at first, but Kaveh's Passive allows him to heal when getting hit by an exploding Dendro Core. This effect gets even stronger once you have his first Constellation. By staying on field for most of the time, Kaveh can utilize the Clam's damaging effect and from C1 onwards deals higher DPS than with Deepwood Memories this way. You should still make sure, however, that at least one of your party members is wearing Deepwood Memories for its resistance shred.
This build focusses let's you play Kaveh in a Spread team but can also be used for Hyperbloom or Burgeon. Make sure someone else in your party has deepwood.
Reverie can only do burning reactions, whereas obsidian can also do burgeon
Flower is better, but gilded dreams is easier to farm because you need Deepwood for the team anyway
VV as generalist, but if not needed in team, Emblem for maximizing own damage. NO can be used to buff, especially when paired with Xiao
Use MH to increase personal damage or VV if you are swirling the element of strong off-field dps's

Noblesse is strongly recommended but if either someone else in the team is using it better or no one can make use of the buff, Clam is the best alternative to maximize damage output. Alternatively songs of days past provides good healing but is not as resin-efficient to farm as clam. Without noblesse, ER can be ignored.
prioritize ER substats, with enough ER, Mona can gain enough  Hydro DMG Bonus to the point where ATK Goblet is better
do not farm heart of depth, only use it if you already have it
Generalist set for personal damage and dendro reactions. Only one per party needed, nahida is the best holder.
Maximizes Nahida's personal damage, preferable when she is the only dendro in party. Gilded not recommended if Nahida doesnt trigger many reactions
Potential Best-in-Slot if the team has ATK-scaling characters who deal significantly more damage than Nahida (e.g., Yae Miko, Fischl)

artifact_set_1: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
note: go for crit dmg when building MH, because rate comes from set bonus
Niche build that does not go for Noelle's personal damage. Mainly played with Furina, Yelan and Xinqiu who are all off-field but gain hydro damage bonus from the crystal shards.
if you have weapon, ER always better than attack
Flower of Paradise lost gives more damage but Gilded dreams is easier to farm if you nee deepwood memories for your dendro support
Gilded dreams is recommended, Lavawalker can be used if you have great pieces. If you are struggling with ER, Emblem is the better option for you.
do not go over 45% crit rate
Prioritize CRate over DMG to maximize Rosaria's passive crit buff
Clam increases Kokomi's personal damage and is good for on-field during her burst, milelith buffs the rest of the party and is good for an off-field Kokomi
Golden Troupe is usually the best, but the other constellations can compete if substats are good
This build goes for both his personal damage output and swirl reactions and does neither as good as the more focussed builds
Off-field playstyle requires ER, on field driver can forgo ER
Gilded dreams can also be used for burning.
If you want to do burgeon, switch to flower of paradise lost
build for pure shielding, needs to get burst up to shield
do not farm shimenawa, only use if if you dont wanna farm pavilion and have it lying around
MH is BiS, shimenawa is second
MH is BiS, shimenawa and blizzard are second best
Emblem is the best set, the others are worse alternatives that are still valid if you have them lying around

artifact_set_1: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City

note: Emblem is easier to farm, but if no one else in the team has noblesse, xinqiu should be wearing it
This build focusses on DPS through transformative reactions (i.e. burgeon, burning and overloaded)
Deepwood for resistance shred. But if someone else in the party needs it more and the party can benefit from an ATK buff, milelith is a good alternative.
Use Witch or Gilded if you play Vape
MH when you play with Furina
Husk can be used in a 2PC combo with emblem to facilitate ER, even more valid when emblem has great substats
